citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b)
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45-2:15 p.m.
on 03/19/2015.
I called the contact numbers that were available to me and left a voicemessage. Contact was made with the
registrant, however, the registrant was away from the facility and unavailable for an inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45-2:15 p.m.
on 03/19/2015.
I called the contact numbers that were available to me and left a voicemessage.  Contact was made with the
registrant, however, the registrant was away from the facility and unavailable for an inspection.
